UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile in the Secure Call application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user profile.

VoiceProfile.title: VoiceProfile
VoiceProfile.description: Represents a voice profile with specific parameters for voice alteration.

id.description: Unique identifier for the voice profile.

pitchShift.description: Pitch shift parameter for voice alteration (-12 to +12 semitones).

formantShift.description: Formant shift parameter for voice alteration (0.5 to 2.0).

tempo.description: Tempo parameter for voice alteration (0.7 to 1.3).

resonance.description: Resonance parameter for voice alteration (0.8 to 1.2).

effects.description: Array of effects applied to the voice.

isCustom.description: Indicates whether the voice profile is custom or default.

createdBy.description: User ID who created the custom voice profile.

securityLevel.description: Security level of the voice profile (e.g., low, medium, high).

UserSettings.title: UserSettings
UserSettings.description: Represents user-specific settings, including security preferences.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user settings.

/users/{userId}/user_settings/{userSetti.description: Stores user-specific settings and security preferences. Uses path-based ownership: only the user with the matching userId can read or write. This enables secure `list` operations.

/users/{userId}/voice_profiles/{voicePro.description: Stores voice profiles associated with a user. Uses path-based ownership: only the user with the matching userId can read or write. This enables secure `list` operations.

/voice_parameters/{voiceParameterId}.description: Stores global voice parameters and presets. Read access is allowed for all authenticated users, but write access is restricted.
